nodes.documentation:
@notice Transfers from the msg.sender account to the specified addresses
        an amount of the economy tokens equivalent (after conversion) to
        the specified amounts in pay currency.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - From address is not null.
         - The lengths of arrays of beneficiaries and amounts are equal.
         - The intended price of the base currency in the pay currency
           wrt the current price is in the registered acceptance margin.
     * @param _payCurrencyCode Currency code of the specified amounts.
@param _baseCurrencyIntendedPrice The intended price of the base currency
                                  used during conversion within function.
nodes.name: pay

arguments.value: Price oracle address is null.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Price oracle decimals number is difference from the required one."

arguments.value: Price oracle decimals number is difference from the required one.

arguments.value: Price oracle already exists.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Price oracle's base currency code does not match."

arguments.value: Price oracle's base currency code does not match.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Price oracle's base currency code does not match."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Adds a new price oracle.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - Only organization's workers are allowed to call the function.
         - The proposed price oracle's address is not null.
         - The proposed price oracle's base currency code is
           equal to the economy base currency code specified in this
           contract constructor.
         - The proposed price oracle does not exist.
         - The proposed price oracle decimals number is equal to
           the contract required price oracle decimals number.
     * @param _priceOracle The proposed price oracle.
nodes.name: addPriceOracle

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Price oracle to remove does not exist."

arguments.value: Price oracle to remove does not exist.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Price oracle to remove does not exist."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Removes the price oracle for the specified pay currency code.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - Only organization's workers are allowed to call the function.
         - Price oracle matching with the specified pay currency code
           exists.
nodes.name: removePriceOracle

arguments.value: Pay currency code is null.

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets an acceptance margin for the base currency price per pay
        currency.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - Only organization's workers are allowed to call the function.
         - The specified pay currency code is not null.
nodes.name: setAcceptanceMargin

arguments.value: Pay currency code is null.

nodes.documentation:

         - The specified pay currency code is not null.

addPriceOracle(address).details: Function requires:         - Only organization's workers are allowed to call the function.         - The proposed price oracle's address is not null.         - The proposed price oracle's base currency code is           equal to the economy base currency code specified in this           contract constructor.         - The proposed price oracle does not exist.         - The proposed price oracle decimals number is equal to           the contract required price oracle decimals number.

constructor.details: Function requires:         - The economy token address is not null.         - The base currency code is not empty.         - Conversion rate from the base currency to the token is not 0.         - The economy token rules address is not null.

params._conversionRate: The conversion rate from the economy base currency                       to the token.
params._conversionRateDecimals: The conversion rate's decimals from the                               economy base currency to the token.

pay(address,address[],uint256[],bytes3,u.details: Function requires:         - From address is not null.         - The lengths of arrays of beneficiaries and amounts are equal.         - The intended price of the base currency in the pay currency           wrt the current price is in the registered acceptance margin.

params._baseCurrencyIntendedPrice: The intended price of the base currency                                  used during conversion within function.
params._payCurrencyCode: Currency code of the specified amounts.

removeAcceptanceMargin(bytes3).details: Function requires:         - Only organization's workers are allowed to call the function.         - The specified pay currency code is not null.

removePriceOracle(bytes3).details: Function requires:         - Only organization's workers are allowed to call the function.         - Price oracle matching with the specified pay currency code           exists.

setAcceptanceMargin(bytes3,uint256).details: Function requires:         - Only organization's workers are allowed to call the function.         - The specified pay currency code is not null.

pay(address,address[],uint256[],bytes3,u.notice: Transfers from the msg.sender account to the specified addresses        an amount of the economy tokens equivalent (after conversion) to        the specified amounts in pay currency.

removeAcceptanceMargin(bytes3).notice: Removes an acceptance margin of the base currency price in the        specified pay currency.

removePriceOracle(bytes3).notice: Removes the price oracle for the specified pay currency code.

setAcceptanceMargin(bytes3,uint256).notice: Sets an acceptance margin for the base currency price per pay        currency.
